mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE AS n LEFT JOIN NOTICE_FILE AS f ON n.BOARD_NUM = f.BOARD_NUM WHERE n.BOARD_NUM = #{ boardNum }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HIT) VALUES (NULL, #{ boardTitle }, #{ boardContent }, #{ boardWriter }, NOW(), 0)
INSERT INTO NOTICE_FILE (ORI_NAME, SAVE_NAME, BOARD_NUM) VALUES (#{ oriName }, #{ saveName }, #{ boardNum })
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTICE WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{ boardNum }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{ startIndex }, #{ endIndex }
